Texts.Chs: 萃取50份^orange;鹅卵石^reset;将会得到^orange;原始矿物^reset;。它们有助于创建^orange;矿物样本^reset;，在许多实验中都至关重要。
Texts.Eng: Extracting from 50 ^orange;cobblestone^reset; will create ^orange;Raw Minerals^reset;. This resource will help create ^orange;Mineral Samples^reset;, essential in many experiments.

Texts.Chs: 做得好！你已经准备好进行下一步了吗？
Texts.Eng: Now it's time to mess with life a bit.
